title: Don't Remove normal Draft
body: I love normal draft, if everybody only played blind, we would see the stress of a blind pick lobby every match, I use normal draft a lot(only use blind when I wanna try something waayy off meta) I don't really feel comfortable playing ranked or blind excusively, and draft was the best of both queues.

replies.body: **It won't be removed for NA, EUW and Brazil.**
They want to remove it in all regions though

You know what, if they remove normal draft from NA I'll just get a secondary account and practice in ranked there. I'll be ruining a lot of people's ranked games with experimental builds and stuff, but there's no way I'm playing blind pick.

You don't need a second account, IIRC. We're getting flex-queue as a separate system from Solo Ranked.

Meaning you can just treat Flex Queue as if it were Normal Draft, plus some fancy rewards, plus some weird restrictions on the MMR of allies you can queue with.

replies.poster: P A C C S U
replies.body: Rito's logic for removing normal draft is simple. Usually people normal draft, dont like normal blind pick. There are a lot of people who dont play ranked at all but play normal draft. Riot is trying to make these people move from normals to ranked, thus getting more people to play ranked and by increasing that playerbase, making ranked queue times faster.This is just my theory.

Good theory, but that's just a really stupid idea on riots part, forcing part of your playerbase to adopt a gamestyle that you don't like is stupid and will probably at least lose 1/4 of the playerbase maybe

Normal draft is the same thing as ranked.
You get matched according to your MMR in both of them
Same ban/pick phase in both of them
The only difference is your displayed "rank" which is inaccurate measurement of your skill. Or at least much less accurate than your MMR.

But ranked provides stress from the people who are tryharding
Normals is the stress free version of ranked, where you can do anything and it wont hurt your or others rank
How many times have you seen people rage on the boards about 1st timing a champ in ranked, going into ranked from just hitting lvl 30, off meta picks in ranked and much more. 
Normals is the home to all of these things, and us normals players accept them

Mute everyone, problem solved? Solution is same as before.
Also, i've seen just as much ragers in normal draft as i've seen in ranked...
Yeah, but ranked still provides an aura of stress for people, this isn't in normals, because there isn't anything to lose

Aura of stress? What? 
You either want to play the game or you want to polish your epeen. Just take these games casually...
People get stressed out in ranked, because its ranked. There are tryhards, people who don't want casual players there and its supposed to be serious Normal is the perfect place for casual players
Replace both normal queues with teambuilder. Easy fix.
